member.name: D3D12_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC
member.summary: Describes the layout of a root signature version 1.0.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC.NumParameters
member.summary: The number of slots in the root signature. This number is also the number of elements in the pParameters array.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC.pParameters
member.summary: An array of structures for the slots in the root signature.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC.NumStaticSamplers
member.summary: Specifies the number of static samplers.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC.pStaticSamplers
member.summary: Pointer to one or more structures.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies options for the root signature layout.
